document.full_text: online video rental company netflix inc has tweaked its canadian streaming service to cut down on the amount of data it uses in a country where internet usage is typically metered and capped.
document.title: netflix cuts data use on canada online service
lines_and_colors: online video rental company netflix inc has tweaked its canadian streaming service to cut down on the amount of data it uses in a country where internet usage is typically metered and capped.
